text: The men's singles tennis event of the 2011 Pan American Games was held from October 17–22 at the Telcel Tennis Complex in Guadalajara.Tennis technical manual The defending Pan American Games champion was Flávio Saretta of Brazil. __TOC__ ==Seeds== ==Draw== Men's singles draw ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ====Section 1==== ====Section 2==== ===Bottom Half=== ====Section 3==== ====Section 4==== ==References== Men's Singles
title: Tennis at the 2011 Pan American Games – Men's Singles
